This code system https://mitw.dicom.org.tw/IG/TWCR/CodeSystem/sequence-of-locoregional-therapy-and-systemic-therapy-codesystem defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
-9 Unknown/Missing Data 資料缺漏
-8 No regional therapy 無區域治療
-7 Locoreginal medical therapy 局部性藥物治療
-1 Sequence unknown；Systemic therapy as the major treatment modality 順序未明；全身性治療為最主要的療法
0 No medical therapy 無藥物治療
1 Induction/Neoadjuvant 導引/前導性輔助療法
2 Concurrent/Concomitant 同步療法
4 Adjuvant 輔助療法
